thread.title_full: Great Little Find! - Review of Hotel HELUSSI, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Samantha F
title: Great Little Find!
text:
We stayed here for 3 nights early March and really enjoyed our stay at this superbly located hotel.
The hotel is ideally located a short walk from the metro stop and only a 10 minute walk from Gare Du Nord.
We stayed in a double room with a small balcony, the room was fairly small but had everything you need including iron, hairdryer and very good coffee. The only minor criticism we could make is that the room did not have a mirror which meant you had to rely solely on the bathroom mirror.
Staff were very helpful and always on hand to answer any questions.
Tip - do not use the shuttle service, get the train into Paris this is much quicker and much cheaper (as we found out on our return journey).
We would definitely return to Hotel Helussi.
